DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess whether BIS values at return of consciousness are different in patients with or without brain tumors.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Intracranial Lesions on Bispectral Index
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing elective craniotomy for removal of frontal or frontotemporal brain tumors. Control group: Neurosurgical patients without intracranial pathology. Patient refusal Significantly increased intracranial pressure Uncontrolled arterial hypertension Significant coronary artery disease Anticipated difficult airway Decreased level of consciousness Existing motor weakness dominant arm/hand Impaired hearing Nausea, vomiting
